alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 25 at 3:55PM PST until February 25 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Moderate snow and icy roads expected. Additional snow accumulations of up to 2 inches possible above 2000 feet. * WHERE...San Luis Obispo County Mountains. * WHEN...Until 6 PM PST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible, with the potential for road closures. Strong winds could cause tree damage and significant blowing and drifting snow.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions from CalTrans are available by calling 1 800 4 2 7 7 6 2 3.
